name: Oombs Quest
description:
-- This game was a birthday gift (and contains a large amount of inside jokes) for one of my friends and as such, is not a completely polished game. there is one unoriginal track (K.K. Slider's Intro from Animal Crossing on the Gamecube), but the rest of the music and art is completely original.

Also for those unaware, the "oombs" are myself, jojo of @washbearzz, snail of @goobygaba, and mars of @dreamtdebrisall on twitter. Also, Ian refers to Ian Wright, the footballer. Again, this is littered with inside jokes.
